paper_abstract: In this paper, we study the superstability for the mu-mixed trigonometric functional equation: integral(G) f(xty)d mu(t) - integral(G) f(xt sigma(y))d mu(t) = 2f(x)g(y), x,y is an element of G, where G is a locally compact group, f,g : G -> C are continuous functions, mu is a complex bounded measure and a is a continuous involution of G. We also give some applications.
paper_title: ON A mu-MIXED TRIGONOMETRIC FUNCTIONAL EQUATION
